amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a new section laying out requirements relating to entry of ocean shipping containers into the United States.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Nadler amendment (A045). The amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Nadler.
